page.title: 09HOUSING, BROAD SQR,LIVERPOOL
page.content: THE HOUSES WERE ORIGINALLY BUILT FOR THE{CITY GOUNCIL IN THE LATE 1920'S. NOW SOME OF THE HOUSES ARE PRIVATELY OWNED BUT MOST ARE STILL RENTED FROM THE COUNCIL.THE HOUSES AROUND OUR SCHOOL ARE{TERRACED OR {SEMI-DETACHED.THE HOUSES HAVE GARDENS IN THE FRONT AND BACK.THERE ARE SOME THREE STOREY BLOCKS OF FLATS BY MUIRHEAD AVENUE.THEY WERE ALSO BUILT IN THE 1920'S AND 30'S.THERE ARE NO HIGH RISE FLATS.THE OLDEST HOUSES IN THE AREA ARE NEAREST THE CITY CENTRE BECAUSE{THE ORIGINAL POPULATION MOVED {INTO THE BROAD SQUARE AREA FROM THE {CENTRE OF LIVERPOOL.
